information_about_will: The client has established a framework for how his estate will be handled after his lifetime, with the vast majority going to philanthropy.

The client has a comprehensive will that directs any assets not specifically allocated to philanthropy during his lifetime to flow to foundations upon his death. The will is periodically reviewed to ensure it reflects current intentions and legal frameworks. It's designed to minimize administrative complexity and potential disputes while maximizing social benefit.

The client has mentioned that he has established clear instructions for his estate, with explicit instructions on asset distribution to philanthropic entities. He has built in discretion for his trustees to respond to changing circumstances.
